#summary Usb-only programming adapter

= Usb-only adapter =

For all the notebook users, that have no good old serial port at hand, there are good news: the new [XeroxpatroneV2 programming tool] supports a usb-only adapter. 

It is a [http://www.harbaum.org/till/i2c_tiny_usb/index.shtml i2c tiny usb]. Just build the adapter from there and attach it to the eeprom. Should work out of the box.
